dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-100 is a dataset consisting of 100 classes with 600 images per class, used for evaluating machine learning algorithms in image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-100

dcterms:creator: G. Cohen
S. Afshar
J. Tapson
A. Van Schaik
dcterms:description: EMNIST extends the MNIST dataset to include handwritten letters, providing a more comprehensive dataset for training and evaluating machine learning models on character recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: EMNIST

dcterms:creator: V. Lomonaco
D. Maltoni
dcterms:description: CORe50 is a dataset designed for continuous object recognition, containing 50 objects collected in 11 different sessions, making it suitable for evaluating continual learning techniques.
dcterms:title: CORe50

dcterms:creator: O. Vinyals
C. Blundell
T. Lillicrap
D. Wierstra
dcterms:description: MiniImageNet-100 is a dataset commonly used in few-shot learning benchmarks, consisting of 50,000 data points and 10,000 testing points from 100 classes.
dcterms:title: MiniImageNet-100

dcterms:description: TinyImageNet-200 is a dataset mentioned in the context of the Fusion Tasks-40 dataset, which combines images from multiple datasets for benchmarking.
dcterms:title: TinyImageNet-200

dcterms:description: Fusion Tasks-40 is a benchmark dataset that combines images from CIFAR-100, MiniImageNet-100, and TinyImageNet-200, creating a total of 400 classes divided into 40 non-IID tasks.
dcterms:title: Fusion Tasks-40
